subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/recorder malfunction.mp3 
  Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  Description : Here is the recording where things were not running smooth. My recorder was acting VERY strange. All is good now after asking the spirit to "leave". WARNING: Audio is very LOUD at the 10 second mark....be careful. Some smaller spikes later but not bad at all. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27s/recorder%20malfunction.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles

Regards,

clockdryve <clockdryve@...>
